articles.author: Sriram Veera
articles.title: South Africa’s $68 million opportunity to rebuild team, India’s chance to forget World Cup heartbreak - The Indian Express
articles.description: Sunday is when India's tour of South Africa kicks off with a three-match T20 series. Having made their mark at the 50 overs World Cup with their entertaining brand of cricket, the two teams now look to keep piling the positives and put in place the plans for …
articles.content: India and South Africa are at a curiously similar place as they start a month-long tour with a three-game T20 series from Sunday. Both teams will view the ODI World Cup with a bittersweetness. Both t… [+8219 chars]
